select event_id as eventId, event_name as eventName, event_type as eventType, event_start as eventStart, event_end as eventEnd, event_local as eventLocal, event_limit as eventLimit, event_real as eventReal, event_restart as eventRestart, event_reend as eventReend, event_text as eventText, (case when event_end > now() then '进行中' when event_end < now() then '已结束' else '已结束' end ) eventStatus, event_state as eventState, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from zly_event a where 1=1
and 1 = 1
and event_end > now()
and event_end < now()
and event_limit = event_real
and EXISTS (select * from zly_event_user b where a.event_id = b.event_id and b.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
order by event_start asc

select event_id as eventId, event_name as eventName, event_type as eventType, event_start as eventStart, event_end as eventEnd, event_local as eventLocal, event_limit as eventLimit, event_real as eventReal, event_restart as eventRestart, event_reend as eventReend, event_text as eventText, (case when event_end > now() then '进行中' when event_end < now() then '已结束' else '已结束' end ) eventStatus, (case when exists (select * from zly_event_user b where b.event_id = a.event_id and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) then '已报名' when event_reend > now() and event_limit = event_real then '名额已满' when event_reend > now() then '线上报名' when event_reend <= now() then '报名已截止' when event_end <= now() then '活动已结束' end ) eventState, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from zly_event a where event_id = #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
